channel.title: Comments on: Platinum #97! Another one cleared from the backlog!

item.title: By: AJayG23

item.description: Is there online Versus trophies for Division 2 ?
item.content:encoded: Is there online Versus trophies for Division 2 ?

item.title: By: PickerLeech
item.dc:creator: PickerLeech
item.description:
Good game?
I started playing it then abandoned it for no good reason. I was enjoying it. Just got distracted by other multiplayer games. I think I'll get back to it when I'm inclined to take on a single player campaign. It seems that I abandon all single player campaigns for the last couple of years, with the exception of TLOU 2.
The DLC looks well received too I think
item.content:encoded:
Good game?

I started playing it then abandoned it for no good reason. I was enjoying it. Just got distracted by other multiplayer games. I think I’ll get back to it when I’m inclined to take on a single player campaign. It seems that I abandon all single player campaigns for the last couple of years, with the exception of TLOU 2.

The DLC looks well received too I think
